Articles.Content:
A friend recently linked me to this online game, which features KSP's music in the background. Credit is given to the artist, so I'm assuming nothing was stolen, but it totally took me by surprise. Anyone else ever found something like this?

http://htwins.net/cuberoll/

Most if not all of KSP's music comes from here: http://incompetech.com

It is probably one of the most-used sets of royalty-free music on the internet.
There are a few original pieces in KSP -- I think the KSP theme music was composed by Harv, but you'll have to check on that one -- but most of the music does indeed come from incompetech.

There are a few original pieces in KSP -- I think the KSP theme music was composed by Harv, but you'll have to check on that one -- but most of the music does indeed come from incompetech.

By Harv you mean HarvesteR right? Not the YouTuber.
